observations

Class ObservationsView

  • java.lang.Object
    • observations.ObservationsView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, ObservationsContract.View

    public class ObservationsView
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObservationsContract.View, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    User interface for the display of weather observation data for the selected Station.
    Author:
    michael, kendall

    • Constructor Detail

      • ObservationsView

        public ObservationsView()
        Constructor. Instantiates the view and adds a progress bar, header panel (for the title and latest weather data), and table panel and a chart of temperature data.

    • Method Detail

        public void setProgressBar(boolean active)
        Displays and hides the progress bar used while waiting for data
        Specified by:
        setProgressBar in interface ObservationsContract.View
        Parameters:
        active - true displays the progress bar and false hides it.

        When the view has finished initalising load the observations from the presenter.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • showLatestObservation

        public void showLatestObservation(Observation obs)
        Creates a header panel containing the selection station details and a summary of the latest weather observation for that station.
        Specified by:
        showLatestObservation in interface ObservationsContract.View
        Parameters:
        obs - a collection of observations for a weather station.

      • showObservationTable

        public void showObservationTable(java.util.List<Observation> observations)
        Create a table to display all observations and attributes and add it to the table scroll pane.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        observations - a collection of observations for a weather station.

      • showChart

        public void showChart(java.util.List<Observation> observations)
        Creates and displays a graph of temperatures for the selected weather station. Uses JFreeChart to build the image.
        Specified by:
        showChart in interface ObservationsContract.View
        Parameters:
        observations - a collection of observations for a weather station.
